page.title: 15TRADE
page.content: {Trade} has played a significant part in the History of Lanark as a town.{ {Lanark }is basically a market town much of its {Trade} been centred on the {Farming} community,who come to { {Lanark}for the animal sales and the Agricultural machinery sales.Many small busineses are dependant on the support they get from the {Farming } community.However there are new { {Industries} in the area like a firm that makes biscuits.The other mainstay of {Trade} used to be Textiles,but the past decade has seen several busineses close due to foreign competition.The food trade in the town is dominated by William Low's and Presto but there are a considerable number of other people in this {Trade} .Generally {Trade }has been affected by the steep increase in rates,which hss forced many out of business.
